show_name: March comes in like a lion (TV)
plot: The protagonist Rei is a 17-year old professional shōgi player, who lives by himself, not having a real family, and has scarcely any friends. Among his acquaintances is a family, which consists of a young woman, Akari, and two young girls, Hinata and Momo, and who also keep a numerous number of cats. (from manga)
opening_theme: "Answer" (アンサー) by BUMP OF CHICKEN
"Sayōnara Bystander" (さよならバイスタンダー) by YUKI
